divs: Sighting DetailsIt was late at night and me and my friends were playing tackle football out in his yard, I look up and i see this object that has lights that blink in an order around the object (three lights, yellow red and bluish green) me and my friends have seen it at my house at night also. But it happens when im outside a night or in the house. The lights made me notice the object then the moving straight path it flew in. I thought at the moment the first time i saw it, Airplane but the lights went all the way around it,so i thought,UFO. The object moved in one path under cloudcover and in plain sight, i could only see lights that went all the way around it. It followed me anywhere when im outside at night. I feel, scared, afraid, curious, and want to uncover the mystery of what this is and prove whether or not extra terrestrial life is REAL. The object stayed in sight then increased speed then disappeared as soon as everyone of us locked onto the object.
Summary: Standing outside, late night, see it everywhere i go at night, blinking lights, stays in straight path
trends: There have been no other sightings in Honaker
This sighting has never been favorited.
